name: FlexibleSpaceBarSettings
desc: Provides sizing and opacity information to a [FlexibleSpaceBar].

fields.name: toolbarOpacity
fields.desc: Affects how transparent the text within the toolbar appears.

fields.name: minExtent
fields.desc: Minimum height of the resulting [FlexibleSpaceBar] when fully collapsed.

fields.name: maxExtent
fields.desc: Maximum height of the resulting [FlexibleSpaceBar] when fully expanded.

fields.name: currentExtent
fields.desc: If the [FlexibleSpaceBar.title] or the [FlexibleSpaceBar.background] is not null, then this value is used to calculate the relative scale of these elements upon initialization.

fields.name: isScrolledUnder
fields.desc: True if the FlexibleSpaceBar overlaps the primary scrollable's contents.

fields.name: hasLeading
fields.desc: True if the FlexibleSpaceBar has a leading widget.
